pr_title: Perform browser sign out on MSAL side

timeline.message: Perform browser sign out on MSAL side

timeline.bodyText: Is info really loud enough for this message?  I think it's at least a warning.
timeline.author: AdamBJohnsonx

replies.bodyText: This means no browser is installed on the device (which is a valid case for some 'work devices')- nothing we can really do here.
replies.author: rpdome

replies.bodyText: In that case, though, we wouldn't find a package name by examining the installed packages in BrowserSelector, right?  And we'll already log an error in those cases on line 590.  But if we didn't log that error, I think this would be a really strange occurrence.
replies.author: AdamBJohnsonx

timeline.bodyText: If you're going to add javadoc, add the method @param -eters.
